availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John L. Scott (Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth’s attorney)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth’s attorney. Ohio native. Married to Theresa Frank Scott in Mason County, Kentucky on September 3, 1857. Married to Sallie Chiles Scott in Mason County, Kentucky, November 30, 1859. Attorney in Mason County, Kentucky in 1860. Attorney and partner in the firm Simpson & Scott, with James Simpson, in Frankfort in 1861. Commonwealth's attorney of the 8th Judicial District of Kentucky from 1862 to 1867.
